Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Election Succession
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: The leader shall be elected by all free, adult colonists.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Seniority Succession
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: The oldest, and most experienced, colonist shall be the leader.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Lot Succession
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: The leader shall be chosen randomly from all citizens.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Nobility Succession
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: The pawn with the highest, and oldest, nobility title will be the leader.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Martial Succession
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: The most accomplished warrior will become our leader.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Quadrum-Long Term
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: Set term of a leader to one quadrum (15 days).

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Half-Year Long Term
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: Set term of a leader to half a year (30 days).

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Year-Long Term
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: Set term of a leader to one year (60 days).

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Indefinite Term
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: Leaders will rule till their death.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Impeach Leader
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: Immediately relieve the current leader of his or her duties and initiate a new succession.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Happyness for All
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: The goal of every government is the happyness of its people. With this doctrine, the higher the median mood of your citizens, the slower the Governance decay.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Cancel Happyness for All
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: We are no longer interested in egalitarianism.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: L'État, c'est moi
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: A happy leader is a productive leader. When the ruler is in a good mood, he, or she, will improve governance better.

Rimocracy.DecisionDef.label: Cancel "L'État, c'est moi"
Rimocracy.DecisionDef.description: Elitism was a mistake, let us abolish it.
